name: Mount Bravo Sniper Warrior Deadly Mission
name_original: Mount Bravo Sniper Warrior Deadly Mission
description:
It is great operation app for those who love action, surgical and war games. Play amazing action game for everyone.You are the new IGI Commando on the front line of the battlefield against the most dangerous terrorist threats to the global world order.This is a modern war fought by an alone commando used to be a sniper in the mountains once. Move through the environments in juicy first person missions and take the all-important Kill Shots.Your mission is to destroy the enemy as they invaded on your land. There are many striker levels in this action game. As soon as you kill all the enemies, if you will complete first level then you may enter to the next adventure missions.
This is a modern war fought by an alone commando used to be a sniper in the mountains once. Move through the environments in juicy first person missions and take the all-important Kill Shots.If you are getting bored and try to make your time well passed then search for unlimited Mount Bravo Sniper Warrior game.
Test your special skill; arm and marshal yourself with deadly alone epic war assassin machine guns.Kill shooter is a First person action game, allows user to experience one of the most thrilling experience of combat missions throughout the streets of Brussels.
How to play:
- Swipe on screen to change the position of gun
- Fire Button on bottom right
- Zoom button is left side
- Top left corner shows you score/points.
Features:
- Thrilling sound effects
- Full functional enemy base environment
- Realistic 3D graphics
- Multiple levels
- Real sound of firing
- One man army
